member.name: T:Tester.IDataSet
member.summary: Data structure containing the rating dataset and associated deviations.

member.name: M:Tester.IDataSet.GetDeviationInfo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Method that returns a tuple containing the deviation between two products and the amount of users on which it was computed.
member.returns: deviation value and amount of users

member.name: P:Tester.IDataSet.Data
member.summary: Dictionary containing the users and their ratings. The ratings are stored in a nested dictionary.
